sentences.en: Chess includes rook, knight, bishop, queen, king and pawn.
sentences.cn: 国际象棋有车 、 马 、 象 、 后 、 王和卒.

sentences.en: Does anyone sorrow for the rook, shot and hung up as a scarecrow?
sentences.cn: 人们把射杀的乌鸦吊起来,吓唬鸟雀, 谁会为死乌鸦感到悲伤?

sentences.en: I, said Rook, With my little book, I'll be the person.
sentences.cn: 是我, 乌鸦说, 我将为他当牧师, 用我的小本子.

sentences.en: Invade with rook to produce a passed pawn.
sentences.cn: 用王和车进攻,并形成通路兵.

sentences.en: Radmanovic, Luke Walton , Trevor Ariza ? even the rook , Javaris Crittenton ? have made contributions at times.
sentences.cn: 拉德 、 沃顿 、 阿里扎--甚至是菜鸟克里坦顿--在适当的时候都会作出贡献.

sentences.en: Simplify to an ending of rook versus minor piece. Invade with king and rook passed pawn.
sentences.cn: 简化成车对马或象的残局. 用王和车进攻,并形成通路兵.

sentences.en: Take . take it all . rook to king, Oh I've been guarding something.
sentences.cn: 从车子到国王.我一直在保护的东西. 统统拿走.

sentences.en: This unexpected move serves to draw the black rook into the game.
sentences.cn: 这步意想不到的招法将黑方的车投入战局.

sentences.en: This was sacrificing a pawn to save a rook.
Under certain , special rules, a king and rook can move simultaneously in a castling move.
sentences.cn: 在特殊的规则下, 国王和车可以同时移动.

sentences.en: Way above her a solitary rook cawed its way home - a lonely, troubled sound.
sentences.cn: 一只秃鼻乌鸦,发出寂寞又焦虑不安的声音,从她头顶孤独地飞过.

sentences.en: Who'll be the person? I, said the Rook, With my little book, I'll be the parson.
sentences.cn: 谁要当牧师? 白嘴鸦说,是我, 用我的小本子, 我会来做牧师.

sentences.en: Who'll be the person? I, said the Rook, With my little book, I'll be the person.
sentences.cn: 谁来当牧师? 是我, 乌鸦说, 我将为他当牧师, 用我的小本子.

sentences.en: You will never win the heart of a rook or the mind of a knight.
sentences.cn: 你永远无法取悦“车”或是赢得“马”的尊重.

trans.tran_en: a large black European bird like a  crow
